Welcome! After reviewing the guidebook, please complete the following onboarding tasks:

- [ ] Request access to Google chat space
- [ ] Check that you have been added to the monthly meetings
- [ ] Review previous running notes
- [ ] Review guidebook
- [ ] Review [`asar`](https://github.com/nmfs-ost/asar) and [`stockplotr`](https://github.com/nmfs-ost/stockplotr) repositories

 Feel free to reach out to any of the [current members of the team](../team/who.qmd) with any additional questions.
